hero.title: The Tropical Eden of the Maldives
hero.description1: The Maldives offer you the ultimate tropical paradise experience. This archipelago of 1,200 coral islands bathed by the Indian Ocean features turquoise waters of exceptional purity and pristine white sand beaches.
hero.description2: Stay in luxury overwater resorts, explore extraordinary underwater worlds, and let yourself be lulled by the absolute serenity of this natural sanctuary. Every moment in the Maldives is an invitation to dream and relax.
